parse.title: Possessed pickaxe
parse.text:
Possessed pickaxe
This article is about the possessed pickaxes found in various locations across Gielinor. For the similar monsters found under Daemonheim and in the Lava Flow Mine, see Animated pickaxe and Possessed pickaxe (Lava Flow Mine).

SMW Subobject for StaticNPC ID: 1015Options: Take, ExamineExamine: Useful for hitting rocks.Release date: 21 December 2004NPC location: Abandoned MineIs members only: trueIs variant of: Possessed pickaxe

Possessed pickaxe is an animated NPC found in the Abandoned Mine and in the Chaos Tunnels. The level 49 version looks like a dropped iron pickaxe until approached in which case it will jump up and attack the player. The higher level versions are always animated, appearing as flying steel pickaxes. Level 49 possessed pickaxes are weak against water spells and their stronger versions are weak against air spells. This NPC is not to be mistaken for its magic axe counterpart.

Universal drops[edit | edit source]

Universal drops are dropped by nearly every monster and skilling action outside of Daemonheim.
These items are dropped alongside main drops.
Item Quantity Rarity GE price High Alch
Key token1RareNot soldNot alchemisable
Mimic kill token (m)11/10,00079,184Not alchemisable

Update history[edit | edit source]

This information has been compiled as part of the update history project. Some updates may not be included – see here for how to help out!
  • patch 11 April 2023 (Update):
    • Can be killed as part of the new undead slayer task.
  • patch 10 April 2017 (Update):
    • Possessed pickaxes no longer drop loot when fighting Treus Dayth in Dominion Tower.
  • ninja 23 June 2014 (Update):
    • The graphics and animations for the following NPCs have been revised:
      • Possessed pickaxes
  • update 21 December 2004 (Update):
    • Added to game.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The magic axe is nearly identical to the possessed pickaxe. Both seem to be animated tools. However, the axe holds a slightly lower combat level, but ironically has slightly higher life points and a higher max hit.
  • Though Possessed Pickaxes are a result of some type of magic, they are weak to all forms of it.
  • Possessed Pickaxes received a graphical update on 23 June 2014.
